entry.title: Ethereum Closes In On Proof-of-Stake After Sepolia Testnet Merge The Sepolia testnet activated PoS consensus on Wednesday at block number 1,450,409.
entry.summary: Sepolia is the second of three testnets to merge their proof-of-work (PoW) execution layers with their PoS consensus layers before the upgrade can take effect on Ethereum’s mainnet.

entry.title: META ditches Novi – is the Web 3 dream over?
entry.summary: FACEBOOK FOUNDER MARK ZUCKERBERG DUMPS CRYPTO screeches the headline from the Mail Online. META IS PULLING THE PLUG ON ITS CRYPTO PAYMENTS WALLET burps Tech Crunch. Yes, Novi, Meta’s crypto wallet is now No pulse, dead, kaput, finito. Yet more evidence of the artist formerly known as Facebook’s ham-fisted attempts to co-opt the values of … META ditches Novi – is the Web 3 dream over? Read More »
